name: smart-flashcards
description: Example static block scaffolded with Create Block tool.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.build: wp-scripts build --webpack-copy-php --config webpack.config.js && sass src/blocks/blocks-style.scss build/style.css && sass src/blocks/blocks-editor.scss build/editor.css
scripts.start: wp-scripts start --webpack-copy-php --config webpack.config.js && sass src/blocks/blocks-style.scss build/style.css --watch && sass src/blocks/blocks-editor.scss build/editor.css --watch
